Docs.title: Documentation & FAQ
Docs.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about Ingetin.

item_1.question: What is Ingetin?
item_1.answer: Ingetin is an automated invoicing assistant. We help track client receivables and send email reminders automatically when due, so you don't have to chase payments manually.

item_2.question: Is it Free?
item_2.answer: Yes! We provide a 'Starter' plan that is free forever for unlimited order logging. The automated email sending feature is available in the Pro plan.

item_3.question: How do Automated Reminders work?
item_3.answer: Once you activate the Pro feature, the system detects invoice due dates. We send polite emails on your behalf on T-3 (3 days before), Due Date, and T+3 (if unpaid).

item_4.question: Is my financial data safe?
item_4.answer: Very safe. We use industry-standard encryption. We will never sell your client data or transaction data to any third parties.

item_5.question: I need further assistance
item_5.answer: If you have technical issues, please contact us via email at support@ingetin.app or through the Feedback form in the footer.

Docs.content: If you have any questions, please contact us at support@ingetin.app.

Cookies.title: Cookie Policy
Cookies.intro: This policy explains how Ingetin uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website.

what_are_cookies.title: 1. What are Cookies?
what_are_cookies.content: Cookies are small data files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide reporting information.

why_we_use.title: 2. Why We Use Cookies
why_we_use.content: We use cookies for several reasons:
list: To keep you signed in (Session Cookies).
To remember your preferences like language and theme.
To understand how you use our site so we can improve it (Analytics).

control.title: 3. How to Control Cookies
control.content: You have the right to decide whether to accept or reject cookies. You can set or amend your web browser controls to accept or refuse cookies.

updates.title: 4. Updates to this Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect, for example, changes to the cookies we use or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons.
